title: Cloud app for image storage and editing
description: My Bachelor of Engineering thesis. It consists of a web page for uploading, managing and editing images with a distributed system of cloud instances for managing the data

title: Basic Chat
description: A web app for real-time text messaging between authorized users of the app

title: Cat Image Generator
description: A web app dedicated to generate random cat images through a friendly interface using the CatAPI

title: vNotes
description: An Android application for creating and editing notes
